title: [Feature] Easier panel window resizing and snapping
author: Pentagrade
body_snippet:
Hi all. Was just wondering (and I feel like its already been suggested but couldn't see it in the issues list) if the panel windows can be more functional when it comes to resizing. For me when I pull a panel out it defaults to a tiny square that needs resizing the moment its made which is a little inconvenient. Its also a little tedious having to resize the window manually to achieve a maximized panel.

I'm not sure how difficult it would be to implement, but if the panel windows could have m...
